long_desc.thetext:
I have a problem with the image-combine keyword of the generator. It seems like it does not find the temporary file created by combining the images.
This is the error message when typing the following in the feedreader directory:
./generate.py image-combine
>>> Initializing cache... >>> Combining images... - Creating image /home/Sales/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/frontend/application/feedreader/source/resource/feedreader/images/combined/icons16.png montage: unable to open image `@/tmp/tmp6r1TiO': No such file or directory @ blob.c/OpenBlob/2480. montage: missing an image filename `/home/Sales/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/frontend/application/feedreader/source/resource/feedreader/images/combined/icons16.png' @ montage.c/MontageImageCommand/1649. The montage command (montage -geometry +0+0 -gravity NorthWest -tile 1x -background None @/tmp/tmp6r1TiO /home/Sales/dev/javascript/qooxdoo/frontend/application/feedreader/source/resource/feedreader/images/combined/icons16.png) failed with the following return code: 256
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 3673 ***
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
